title: Pyramid of Biomass with 5 answer options

content.question: All of the following statements about the pyramid of biomass are correct EXCEPT:

choices.label: Biomass is the total dry mass of the organisms present.
The base of the pyramid generally represents primary consumers.
The amount of biomass at a particular level of the pyramid depends on the amount of energy available.
Certain toxins tend to become concentrated at upper levels of the pyramid.
Biomass pyramids tend to vary for different ecosystems.

content.answer: The base of the pyramid generally represents primary consumers.
